summary.span: 釋放 類別目前的執行個體所使用的全部資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose\` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose\` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 傳回 ，可用來逐一查看資料讀取器中的資料列。

span.span: Returns an that can be used to iterate through the rows in the data reader.

returns.span: ，可用來逐一查看資料讀取器中的資料列。

span.span: An that can be used to iterate through the rows in the data reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然您可以使用這個方法來擷取明確的建構函式，在語言，支援明確**foreach**建構，它是直接以逐一查看資料讀取器中的資料列中使用迴圈建構的工作變得更容易。Although you can use this method to retrieve an explicit constructor, in languages that support an explicit **foreach** construct, it is simpler to use the looping construct directly in order to iterate through the rows in the data reader. 如果您實作這個方法時，它應該傳回的新執行個體，或確定您的列舉值傳回物件。If you implement this method, it should return a new instance of or ensure that your enumerator returns objects.

summary.span: 傳回的工作尚未完成時，不應該叫用 DbDataReader 物件的其他方法和屬性。

summary.span: 將讀取器向前移到結果集中的下一個資料錄。

returns.span: 如果有多個資料列則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if there are more rows; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料讀取器的預設位置是在第一個資料錄之前。The default position of a data reader is before the first record. 因此，您必須呼叫以開始存取資料。Therefore, you must call to begin accessing data.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RecordsAffected As Integer
public: abstract property int RecordsAffected { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得因執行 SQL 陳述式所變更、插入或刪除的資料列數目。

span.span: Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.

value.span: 已變更、插入或刪除的資料列數。

span.span: The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted.

value.span: SELECT 陳述式的值為 -1，如果沒有任何資料列受到影響，或是陳述式失敗，則為 0。

span.span: -1 for SELECT statements; 0 if no rows were affected or the statement failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `RecordsAffected`屬性才會設定讀取所有資料列，而且您關閉`DataReader`。The `RecordsAffected` property is not set until all rows are read and you close the `DataReader`.

para.span: 這個屬性和應該實作，以讀取器關閉時，傳回值。

span.span: This property and should be implemented to return a value when the reader is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property VisibleFieldCount As Integer
public: virtual property int VisibleFieldCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得 中沒有隱藏的欄位數。

span.span: Gets the number of fields in the that are not hidden.
The number of fields that are not hidden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值會用來判斷 中有多少欄位是可見的。This value is used to determine how many fields in the are visible. 例如，部分主索引鍵上的 SELECT 會傳回索引鍵的剩餘部分做為隱藏欄位。For example, a SELECT on a partial primary key returns the remaining parts of the key as hidden fields. 隱藏欄位永遠會附加在可見欄位之後。The hidden fields are always appended behind the visible fields.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview
